description.narrative: The project aims to improve access to socio-economic centers in Eastern, Northern and Uva Provinces, through the sustainable management of improved road infrastructure

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1B 5(i) | Description :Eastern PC shall commencing in 2010 and thereafter for the durationof the project commit revenues collected from vehicle licensingto be used for routine and periodic road maintenance. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1D (2) | Description :Recipient shall remit to Eastern Province any amounts required tobring the amount available for routine and periodic road maintenance to a minimum annually or such additional amounts. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1D (i) | Description :Recipient shall at least remit agreed amount for periodic roadmaintenance to Uva Province or such additional amounts in each such year as shall be required to meet minimum routine roadmaintenance re | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1B 5(b) | Description :Establishment and maintenance of Project Steering Committees |Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1B 5(g) | Description :Hiring qualified Staff and allocation of adequate resources by PCs tocomply with provisions of sufficient and qualified staff. | Due Date :22-Sep-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1B 5(h) | Description :Commit annually for routine road maintenance from revenue collectedfrom vehicle licensing in such amount as may be required to meet minimum rountine road maintenance requirements. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Reduction in average travel time to socio-economic centers in Uva Province
